moves.1. e4: I open with a brilliant Pawn to e5... strategically ingenius.
moves.2. Bc4: I fire out the bishop to f4, threatening nothing.
moves.2... Nf6: A critical mistake as opponent responds with Knight to f6.
moves.3. f3: I deal a crushing blow by placing pawn to f3.
moves.3... d5: Noticing trouble, opponent moves pawn to d5.
moves.4. exd5: I capture pawn, threatening mate... Opponent times out game.
